channel.title: Good God help me please
channel.description: Im very new and Im not sure how to make my client work when i turn it into a .jar can somebody help me?

item.title: Good God help me please
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

[quote=“Scaar, post:7, topic:381742”][quote author=X Entinity X link=topic=477552.msg3494397#msg3494397 date=1297198094]
Then you didn’t JAR correctly, and I know you don’t want a Webclient but follow the Tutorial until you reach the part where you have to add your Client.jar to a FileManager.
[/quote]

Oh alright

do you have a link to this tutorial? or is it easy to find?[/quote]

Try the search bar… or just go into the client tutorial thread. I’m sure theres a tut on it.

Read full topic

item.title: Good God help me please
item.dc:creator: @Scaar1 Scaar
item.description:
@Scaar1 wrote:

X Entinity X:

Well, your going to need various Webclient tutorials because your going to need Cache downloading. Then your going to need JarMaker to create JAR’s useing the main-fest, “Client.java”.

I have jar maker and whatnot but i dont really wanna make a webclient yet i want to make it into an executable jar so i can post for dl while server is in beta.

but every time i make a jar it just makes a noise at me and doesnt load the client.

Read full topic

item.title: Good God help me please
item.dc:creator: @Scaar1 Scaar
item.description:
@Scaar1 wrote:

the search bar doesn’t always give a definite answer which is why i asked in the “Client Help section”

so unless you can give me a relativity accurate answer please don’t post. Im not asking to be Spoonfed Im asking for a link so i can learn or if you want to give me a detailed post on how you can, its a community to help people so please help
